metadata.title: USN-4136-1 -- wpa_supplicant and hostapd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that wpa_supplicant incorrectly handled certain management frames. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4136-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  hostapd - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.5 wpagui - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.5 wpasupplicant-udeb - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.5 wpasupplicant - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.5 No subscription required
